review: I love the product, but im disappointed with the fact that so many of the tv shows and movies you have to pay for. Netflix has most of the shows for free. Not to mention a lot of the apps i can get on my kindel i cant get on this. But other than that the fire tv is great.
author: Tralo29

review: Great product. Dual band wifi is better than most streaming media boxes I have tested. Good Interface.Only negative is the lack of some of more popular apps. i think It would be an absolute knockout product if they added xbmc or spmc to the amazon store instead of having to sideload it. Keep in mind SPMC is on amazon store but you still have to sideload it to firetv. Remote feels great. Great design but it does consume batteries fast. Not sure why. Almost twice as fast as most other media box remotes i have tried. Also, no USB port for external storage.Overall, a winner from Amazon in my opinion.
